name: Thran Quarry
text: At the beginning of the end step, if you control no creatures, sacrifice Thran Quarry.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

name: Serra Avatar
text: Serra Avatar's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.\nWhen Serra Avatar is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

name: Lord of Atlantis
text: Other Merfolk creatures get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor: A master of tactics, the Lord of Atlantis makes his people bold in battle merely by arriving to lead them.

name: Crusade
text: White creatures get +1/+1.

name: Elvish Lyrist
text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor: "Make me thy lyre, even as the forest is: What if my leaves are falling like its own!" - Percy Bysshe Shelley, "Ode to the West Wind"

name: City of Brass
text: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor: "Enter this palace-gate and ask the news Of greatness fallen into dust and clay."\n—The Arabian Nights, trans. Burton

name: Volcanic Hammer
text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Cast the weight as though it were a die, to see a rival's fate.

name: Giant Growth
text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Two-Headed Dragon
text:
Flying
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature each combat.
{1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Slith Firewalker
text: Haste\nWhenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: The Sligh incubate in the Great Furnace’s heat, emerging on Mirrodin’s surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

name: Royal Assassin
text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become part of the forest after death.

name: Shard Phoenix
text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)\nSacrifice Shard Phoenix: Shard Phoenix deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.\n{R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Soltari Priest
text: Protection from red\nShadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
flavor: "In Rath," the priest said, "there is even greater need for prayer."

name: Whirling Dervish
text: Protection from black\nAt the beginning of each end step, if Whirling Dervish dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: Amid this whirling hurricane of blades, there is no calm eye in which the hapless can find shelter.

name: Glorious Anthem
text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor: Once heard, the battle song of an angel becomes part of the listener forever.

name: Elvish Champion
text: Other Elf creatures get +1/+1 and have forestwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor: "We've endured your slights to Gaea with the grace of tolerance. Now behold the grace of our ferocity."

name: Mad Auntie
text: Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1.\n{T}: Regenerate another target Goblin.
flavor: One part cunning, one part wise, and many, many parts demented.

name: Slith Firewalker
text: Haste\nWhenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: The Sligh incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.
